ADD_LIBRARY(Utils 
  DocumentHandler.cpp
  JsonParser.cpp
  TreeWidgetEventHandler.cpp
  ModelEventHandler.cpp
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Utils PRIVATE 
  ${VTK_LIBRARIES}
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Widgets
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::OpenGLWidgets 
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Core
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Gui
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Xml
  Defaults
  Widgets
  GraphicalUtils
  Rendering
)

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(Utils PUBLIC
    ${PRJ_SOURCE_DIR}/src/UserInterface/Utils
)

# Autogenerated uic files
if(WIN32)
  TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(Utils INTERFACE 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Utils_autogen/include_Release
  )
else()
  TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(Utils INTERFACE 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Utils_autogen/include
  )
endif()
